effect.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.aegis.descrip: Grants Armor and Spell Resistance to any element
effect.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.erode.descrip: Shred Armor and Spell Resistance to any element
effect.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.seismic_ride_: Summon helper timer for Seismic Surf
spell.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.chunker.guide: Summons a large rolling dirt block that moves forward, damaging and knocking back enemies in its path.
spell.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.dripstone_bolt: Fires a shard of dripstone that shatters on impact, damaging the target and 50% of its damage in a small area.
spell.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.eroding_boulde: Shoots out a small boulder that explodes on contact, dealing damage to nearby enemies and applying the Erode effect.
spell.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.fissure.guide: Creates a fissure that travels forward, and erupts in a small spike that deals damage.
Summons a small geo pillar that resonates with nearby allies, releasing periodic waves energy. Standing near it grants stacking bonuses to Armor and Spell Resistance to every element. Can serve as the main resonance conductor for Pillar of the Resounding Earth.
spell.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.petrivise.guid: Raises two massive stone walls on opposite sides that slam together, crushing enemies caught between them. The impact funnels targets toward the center, lining them up for follow-up attacks.
spell.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.pillar_of_the_: Summons a large geo pillar that sends out powerful shockwaves, damaging enemies while shredding their Armor and Spell Resistance to every element. The shockwaves resonate with nearby geo entities. Certain geo entities may trigger additional special effects when struck by a resonance shockwave.
spell.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.seismic_surf.g: Summons a large rideable boulder that rises into the air and moves forward on its own in the direction you're looking. Near the end of its duration, it'll safely drop the rider down. Rider can trigger this drop early by casting Counterspell on it.
spell.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.solar_beam.gui: Unleashes a continuous beam of solar energy in a straight line, damaging all entities caught within. Can only be obtained by defeating Umvuthi, The Sunbird.
spell.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.solar_storm.gu: Applies an effect that calls continuous sunstrikes onto nearby enemies, damaging them and setting them on fire. Can only be obtained by defeating Umvuthi, The Sunbird.
spell.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.tremor_spike.g: Erupts multiple spikes in expanding rings around the caster, dealing damage and knocking up nearby entities.
spell.gtbcs_geomancy_plus.tremor_step.gu: Applies an effect that deals damage to nearby enemies while sprinting and grants increased movement speed to the caster.
